extension.summary: CutCable Build Wizard and Update Manager
extension.description: Install and manage CutCable Kodi builds with automatic updates. Supports multiple build configurations including Plex integration and gaming add-ons.
extension.disclaimer: This addon manages Kodi configurations. Use at your own risk.
extension.news: v1.0.0 (2025-06-02) - Initial release - Support for 6 build configurations - Automatic update checking - User settings persistence - Admin build access - Beta channel support
